summary: The AdSense loader script was added to frontend/index.html, but it does not appear to be inserted exactly as provided (line break/whitespace differences). Additionally, the diff includes unrelated project summary/feature scope changes not requested by REQ-35.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the provided Google AdSense loader script tag to the global HTML <head> exactly as provided.
missing_requirements.reason: In frontend/index.html, the script tag is split across two lines/contains different whitespace/formatting, so it is not "exactly as provided" per the acceptance criteria.

hallucinated_features.description: Large set of unrelated frontend/UI/content changes (e.g., Join as LIC Agent page, overlays/gradients, navigation/header/footer changes, WhatsApp prompt behavior changes, forms and hooks) beyond adding an AdSense <script> tag.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest non-goals specify no other markup/UI changes, no routing/navigation/forms changes, and only adding the AdSense loader script to the global <head>. The diff summary indicates broader scope updates.

hallucinated_features.description: Project summary changed to describe expanding the site with recruitment features and multiple UX changes.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-35 and conflicts with the request to introduce no other markup/UI changes as part of adding the AdSense script.
